price: Surely We have created man in the best form[4],
arabic: لَقَدۡ خَلَقۡنَا ٱلۡإِنسَٰنَ فِيٓ أَحۡسَنِ تَقۡوِيمٖ
footnotes: [4] i.e., in upright and balanced form and nature.
